stimulusHtml: A scientist wants to study the effect of DDT in a fish-eating bird species. She measures a variety of variables in a population of birds over a period of ten years to determine how levels of DDT affect bird survival and reproduction. Which of the following identifies a scientific question she could ask to best evaluate the effect of DDT on the bird species?
choicesHtml: Is the bird species able to metabolize DDT faster than the fish the birds consume?
Does the persistence of DDT lead to eggshell thinning or developmental deformities in the bird species?
Has the decrease in DDT usage led to a decrease in DDT concentration in the tissues of fish-eating birds?
How long does it take for DDT to break down once it is absorbed in the fatty tissues of the fish-eating birds?
